channel.title: React on DevLog
channel.description: Recent content in React on DevLog

item.title: Guide on React with Laravel 5.4
item.description: Laravel 5.4 comes shipped with a nice integration with Vuejs, you install the framework and everything is already in place, there are even few example files you can start from, but what about React? Vuejs is a great framework, but I like the less conventional approach of React and the more active community, and thanks to the amazing Laravel Mix, switching to React is a no brainer. Create a Laravel project composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel laravel-react And install the npm dependencies
